appName.context: The name of the application, will be inclided in various places such as the title meta tag

full.context: The full name of the server

part1.context: The first part of the split server name

part2.context: The second part of the split server name

message.text: The server is currently in maintenance mode, so some features of the website may not function correctly.
message.context: This message is shown to users when the server is under maintenance.

title.context: The title for the main page of the osu!sunrise website

description.text: Join osu!sunrise, a feature-rich private osu! server with Relax, Autopilot, ScoreV2 support, and a custom PP system tailored for Relax and Autopilot gameplay.
description.context: The meta description for the main page of the osu!sunrise website

motto.context: The tagline or motto displayed on the main page

description.text: Features rich osu! server with support for Relax, Autopilot and ScoreV2 gameplay, with a custom art‑state PP calculation system tailored for Relax and Autopilot.
description.context: The main description text explaining the server's features on the homepage

register.context: Button text to register a new account

wiki.context: Button text linking to the connection guide

whyUs.context: Section heading asking why users should choose this server

title.context: Title of the free features card on the main page

description.text: Enjoy features like osu!direct and username changes without any paywalls — completely free for all players!
description.context: Description text explaining the free features available on the server

title.context: Title of the PP system card on the main page

description.text: We use the latest performance point (PP) system for vanilla scores while applying a custom, well-balanced formula for Relax and Autopilot modes.
description.context: Description text explaining the custom PP calculation system

title.context: Title of the medals card on the main page

description.text: Earn unique, server-exclusive medals as you accomplish various milestones and achievements.
description.context: Description text explaining the custom medals system

title.context: Title of the updates card on the main page

description.text: We're always improving! Expect regular updates, new features, and ongoing performance optimizations.
description.context: Description text explaining the server's update frequency

title.context: Title of the PP calculator card on the main page

description.text: Our website offers a built-in PP calculator for quick and easy performance point estimates.
description.context: Description text explaining the built-in PP calculator feature

title.context: Title of the bancho core card on the main page

description.text: Unlike most private osu! servers, we've developed our own custom bancho core for better stability and unique feature support.
description.context: Description text explaining the custom bancho core development

title.context: Section heading for the getting started guide

description.text: Just three simple steps and you're ready to go!
description.context: Description text introducing the getting started steps

title.context: Title of the download step tile

description.text: If you do not already have an installed client
description.context: Description text for the download step

button.context: Button text to download the osu! client

title.context: Title of the registration step tile

description.text: Account will allow you to join the osu!sunrise community
description.context: Description text for the registration step

button.context: Button text to register a new account

title.context: Title of the connection guide step tile

description.text: Which helps you set up your osu! client to connect to osu!sunrise
description.context: Description text for the connection guide step

button.context: Button text to open the connection guide

totalUsers.context: Label for the total number of registered users

usersOnline.context: Label for the number of currently online users

usersRestricted.context: Label for the number of restricted users

totalScores.context: Label for the total number of scores submitted

serverStatus.context: Label for the current server status

online.context: Status indicator when the server is online

offline.context: Status indicator when the server is offline

underMaintenance.context: Status indicator when the server is under maintenance

title.context: The title for the wiki page of the osu!sunrise website

header.context: The main header text for the wiki page

title.context: Title of the wiki article explaining how to connect to the server

intro.text: To connect to the server, you need to have a copy of the game installed on your computer. You can download the game from the official osu! website.
intro.context: Introduction text explaining the prerequisites for connecting to the server

step1.text: Locate the osu!.exe file in the game directory.
step1.context: First step instruction for connecting to the server

step2.text: Create a shortcut of the file.
step2.context: Second step instruction for connecting to the server

step3.text: Right click on the shortcut and select properties.
step3.context: Third step instruction for connecting to the server

step4.text: In the target field, add -devserver {serverDomain} at the end of the path.
step4.context: Fourth step instruction for connecting to the server, includes server domain parameter

step5.context: Fifth step instruction for connecting to the server

step6.text: Double click on the shortcut to start the game.
step6.context: Sixth step instruction for connecting to the server

imageAlt.context: Alt text for the connection guide image

title.context: Title of the wiki article about multiple accounts policy

answer.text: No. You are only allowed to have one account per person.
answer.context: Direct answer to the multiple accounts question

consequence.text: If you are caught with multiple accounts, you will be banned from the server.
consequence.context: Explanation of the consequence for having multiple accounts

title.text: Can I use cheats or hacks?
title.context: Title of the wiki article about cheating policy

answer.text: No. You will be banned if you are caught.
answer.context: Direct answer to the cheating question

policy.text:
We are very strict on cheating and do not tolerate it at all.

If you suspect someone of cheating, please report them to the staff.
policy.context: Explanation of the cheating policy and how to report cheaters

title.text: I think I was restricted unfairly. How can I appeal?
title.context: Title of the wiki article about appealing restrictions

instructions.text: If you believe you were restricted unfairly, you can appeal your restriction by contacting the staff with your case.
instructions.context: Instructions on how to appeal a restriction

contactStaff.context: Information about where to contact staff for appeals, includes link placeholder

title.text: Can I contribute/suggest changes to the server?
title.context: Title of the wiki article about contributing to the server

answer.text: Yes! We are always open to suggestions.
answer.context: Positive answer about contributing to the server

instructions.text:
If you have any suggestions, please submit them at our GitHub page.

Longterm contributors can also have chance to get permanent supporter tag.
instructions.context: Instructions on how to contribute, includes GitHub link and information about supporter tags

title.text: I can't download maps when I'm in multiplayer, but I can download them from the main menu
title.context: Title of the wiki article about downloading maps in multiplayer

solution.text: Disable Automatically start osu!direct downloads from the options and try again.
solution.context: Solution to the multiplayer download issue

title.context: The title for the rules page of the osu!sunrise website

header.context: The main header text for the rules page

title.context: Title of the general rules section
Title of the no cheating rule, displayed in bold

description.text: Any form of cheating, including aimbots, relax hacks, macros, or modified clients that give unfair advantage is strictly prohibited. Play fair, improve fair.
description.context: Description of the no cheating rule

warning.text: As you can see, I wrote this in a bigger font for all you "wannabe" cheaters who think you can migrate from another private server to here after being banned. You will be found and executed (in Minecraft) if you cheat. So please, don't.

title.context: Title of the no multi-accounting rule, displayed in bold

description.text: Only one account per player is allowed. If your primary account was restricted without an explanation, please contact support.
description.context: Description of the no multi-accounting rule

title.context: Title of the no impersonation rule, displayed in bold

description.text: Do not pretend to be a staff member or any well-known player. Misleading others can result in a username change or permanent ban.
description.context: Description of the no impersonation rule

title.context: Title of the chat and community rules section
Title of the be respectful rule, displayed in bold

description.text: Treat others with kindness. Harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or toxic behaviour won't be tolerated.
description.context: Description of the be respectful rule

title.context: Title of the no NSFW content rule, displayed in bold

description.text: Keep the server appropriate for all audiences — this applies to all user content, including but not limited to usernames, banners, avatars and profile descriptions.
description.context: Description of the no NSFW content rule

title.context: Title of the no advertising rule, displayed in bold

description.text: Don't promote other servers, websites, or products without admin approval.
description.context: Description of the no advertising rule

title.context: Title of the important disclaimer section

intro.text: By creating and/or maintaining an account on our platform, you acknowledge and agree to the following terms:
intro.context: Introduction text for the disclaimer section

title.context: Title of the no liability disclaimer, displayed in bold

description.text: You accept full responsibility for your participation in any services provided by Sunrise and acknowledge that you cannot hold the organization accountable for any consequences that may arise from your usage.
description.context: Description of the no liability disclaimer

title.context: Title of the account restrictions disclaimer, displayed in bold

description.text: The administration reserves the right to restrict or suspend any account, with or without prior notice, for violations of server rules or at their discretion.
description.context: Description of the account restrictions disclaimer

title.context: Title of the rule changes disclaimer, displayed in bold

description.text: The server rules are subject to change at any time. The administration may update, modify, or remove any rule with or without prior notification, and all players are expected to stay informed of any changes.
description.context: Description of the rule changes disclaimer

title.context: Title of the agreement by participation disclaimer, displayed in bold

description.text: By creating and/or maintaining an account on the server, you automatically agree to these terms and commit to adhering to the rules and guidelines in effect at the time.
description.context: Description of the agreement by participation disclaimer
